dmca.title: [EV1-C1511366N] Copyright infringmnet - Bia2.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 12:18 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1511366N] Copyright infringmnet - Bia2.com Subject: [EV1-C1511366N] Copyright infringmnet - Bia2.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright infringmnet - Bia2.com Added by system at Tuesday, Oct 24 2006 02:24 pm X-MailFrom: mehrdad@caltexrecords.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Oct 24 15:25:13 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 24 Oct 2006 15:25:13 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 24 Oct 2006 15:25:13 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from mehrdad@caltexrecords.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GcSpl-0000cc-69 for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 24 Oct 2006 15:25:13 -0500 Received: from mail.planetonline.com ([209.87.144.3] helo=planetonline.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from mehrdad@caltexrecords.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GcSpY-000Huc-09 for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 24 Oct 2006 15:25:01 -0500 Received: from Mehrdad [67.127.249.82] by planetonline.com with ESMTP (SMTPD-8.22) id A6A50458; Tue, 24 Oct 2006 13:25:09 -0700 Message-ID: <02a001c6f7aa$743b9280$0600a8c0@Mehrdad> From: "Mehrdad" To: Cc: Subject: Copyright infringmnet - Bia2.com Date: Tue, 24 Oct 2006 13:24:48 -0700 Organization: Caltex.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_029C_01C6F76F.C7A83D00" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 209.87.144.3 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of caltexrecords.com) client-ip=209.87.144.3; envelope-from=mehrdad@caltexrecords.com; helo=planetonline.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 24 Oct 2006 20:25:13.0468 (UTC) FILETIME=[82A043C0:01C6F7AA] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Re: Copyright infringements To Whom It May Concern: We are submitting this request for un-authorized use of our copyrighted music in one of your hosted sites. 1- Bia2.com Have displayed and soliciting our hundreds of our sound-recordings with no license or authorization from us. Therefore; we are requesting that Caltex Records copyrighted music to be taken off of this site immediately. We have faxed you our affidavit statement and copies are attached. Best regards, Mehrdad Pakravan Caltex Records 9045-A Eton Avenue Canoga Park, CA 91304 USA Tel: 818-700-8657 Offices Cell: 818-445-1710 Fax: 818-700-0285 Email: mehrdad@caltexrecords.com MIME element (text/html)

Re:                  Copyright infringements

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

We are submitting this request for un-authorized use of our copyrighted music in one of your hosted sites.

 

1-          &nbs p;       Bia2.com

 

Have displayed and soliciting our hundreds of our sound-recordings with no license or authorization from us.

 

Therefore; we are requesting that Caltex Records copyrighted music to be taken off of this site immediately.

 

We have faxed you our affidavit statement and copies are attached.

 

 

Best regards,
Mehrdad Pakravan
Caltex Records
9045-A Eton Avenue
Canoga Park, CA 91304
USA
Tel: 818-700-8657 Offices
Cell: 818-445-1710
